column2: Conclusion: Using this Atlas for Management

In conclusion, effective management requires a clear
understanding of human activities in the region that
encompasses the Captain John Smith Chesapeake
National Historic Trail and Chesapeake Bay Watershed.
By providing the “basic facts” about such activities,
this atlas can help managers, citizens, and others better
